snippet.title: Farm It! Apple Arcade Trailer
snippet.description: Although it may at first glance look like just another mobile farming game, I'm intrigued by the tactile and oddly satisfying approach to gameplay in Farm It! Plus it's an Apple Arcade title, so that helps put my free-to-play concerns to rest. https://apps.apple.com/us/app/farm-it/id1538476446 #mobilegames #applearcade #farmingsim
